settings.title: Sleeping Aid Tablets
settings.subtitle: Sleep is incredibly important so it's essential to get a good night's rest. We can help to find the right sleeping aid for you.

settings.title: What is sleep medication?
settings.text: Sleep medications are used to treat insomnia, jet lag and other sleep-related conditions. They work by making you feel drowsy and relaxed. They also ensure you stay asleep if you are prone to waking up in the night. There are variations of sleeping pills that can work for different situations.

settings.title: How should I use a sleep aid tablet?
settings.text: A sleeping pill should only be taken right before you plan on sleeping. It's important that you have completed all your activities before taking any sleep tablet, as the pill will make you feel drowsy.

settings.title: What are the side effects to sleeping pills?
settings.text: Sleeping pills usually will make you feel drowsy so they are potentially dangerous to take at incorrect times, e.g. when driving or operating equipment. Common side effects also include a bitter or metallic taste in the mouth or a dry mouth.

settings.title: What is a melatonin sleeping pill?
settings.text: Melatonin tablets are commonly used to treat jet lag. They contain the natural hormone melatonin which is released in the body when the sun goes down to tell the body it's time to sleep. Taking a melatonin supplement can help you adjust to a new time zone, especially if it's not very sunny.

settings.title: How can I cure insomnia quickly?
settings.text: There are ways that can help you induce sleep fast. Drinking some teas or practising breathing exercises can help to relax you enough to fall asleep.

settings.title: What is a sleep therapy that could help with anxiety?
settings.text: Cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT) is a therapy used to treat insomnia. During this therapy, you will learn how to change your behaviour before bedtime as well as adjust your thoughts before sleep. The therapy will also work towards changing any lifestyle habits that may be negatively contributing to your sleep problems.

settings.text: All orders placed before 14:00 from Monday to Friday will be dispatched that day. The orders are sent using 24 Hour Tracked delivery provided by Royal Mail. Items will usually arrive the very next day after the order has been placed. We also provide tracking for your orders to check the status and location of your parcel.

settings.title: What is an online consultation?
settings.text: An online consultation checks if you are eligible to purchase the product. Some products only require an online consultation which approximately takes 1 minute to complete, enabling you to buy the product. Other products will also require a prescription; in this case, you will need to complete the online consultation, and then one of our partner pharmacy prescribers or doctors will review the online consultation questions and approve the order for delivery if you are eligible to purchase the item.

settings.title: How is the medication packaged?
settings.text: All our medication is packaged in plain confidential padded white or brown envelopes. This ensures that your orders are discreet, and the content of the orders will be for your eyes only.

settings.title: When will my order be delivered?
settings.text: If you have placed an order before 14:00 Monday to Friday, you will receive the order the next day.

settings.title: Can I return my order?
settings.text: For non-medicinal products, you are eligible to return the product within 14 days of receipt in the same packaging you received. For medicinal products, you are eligible to cancel the order only until it has been dispatched. From that point forward, you are no longer eligible to return the order.

settings.title: Can I cancel my order?
settings.text: You have the right to cancel your order for medication up to the point when your medication is dispatched.

settings.title: Is this medication suitable for me?
settings.text: Please get in touch with a doctor if you are unsure what medication is suitable for you. You can also complete our online consultation form to check your eligibility for the product.

settings.title: Can I order this if I am under 18 years old?
settings.text: No, we do not accept orders from individuals under 18. All orders must be placed by adults only.
